title: The Great Balance of Parenting
itunes:summary:
Disciplining your child is critically important for helping him or her develop as a person. But if you overuse discipline, it can backfire on you as a parent. John and Danny explain why it's good to not repeat yourself too much when asking your kids to do something. Featuring Dr. Kevin Leman and Jean Daly.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Receive the book "Why Your Kids Misbehave--And What to Do About It" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2022-05-31?refcd=1443101

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/the-great-balance-of-parenting/#featured-resource-cta

Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/understanding-the-root-of-your-child-s-misbehavior-digital/?refcd=1443101

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
